Text: Can I Boot It From Hard Drive? Coz My CD Rom Is Not Working.
i Mean Can I Install It From Hard Drive? Coz My CD Rom Is Not Working.

yes or no..when it asks you where to boot from there is an opt. of hdd...u can select that but only if there's another os in the comp.i just cant tell u enough about it as i have never booted from my hard disk..i just dont have a exp of that..sorry bt i could not help more than that..
